title: Remove landing headline text and keep proposal buttons only

requirements.summary: Remove the central proposal/question headline from the pre-acceptance landing view while keeping the two existing CTA buttons, background, confetti, and heart reveal behavior unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: On initial load (when not accepted), there is no headline/question text rendered above or around the buttons.
The existing two-button layout remains functional: the "No" button still evades pointer/touch interaction and the "Yessss miss madam baby ji" button is still clickable.
Clicking the "Yessss miss madam baby ji" button still triggers the existing confetti effect and shows the existing heart-shaped reveal card.

file_operations.description: Remove the <h1> proposal/question headline from the not-accepted branch so the landing screen renders only the existing ProposalButtons over the existing FloatingHeartsBackground; keep acceptance state wiring intact to preserve confetti and HeartRevealCard behavior.
